description: Describes how a Source is collected (i.e muxed) into another Source
title: Source Collection Item

id.description: Identifier of the Source that is collected (child Source)

slot.description: The logical ordering of contributing Sources. Must be unique among the collection

role.description: A human-readable role of the Source in the Process (e.g. 'R' to denote a right audio channel in a mux of mono audio Sources)
